name: Tom Francis (prototype)
description:
Tom Francis is an international and space super-spy.

A stealth based platformer.

press F to full screen

v 0.1 (01/28/17) - Wizard Jam 4 prototype

v 0.2 (2/17/17) - new art and animations, grappling hook works, however level and enemy AI is extremely rudimentary and buggy. Tutorial level/grappling hook test building. Guns are in the game, but don't get dropped by enemies yet. If you press 1, you can make a gun appear.
